title: Enhancing Patient Care Practical Skills: Short-Intensive Training for Sustainable Leadership Competency

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can explain the 17 UN SDGs in connection with their major field (science)
Learners can analyze real-world cases and propose solutions using a sustainability-oriented decision-making framework
Learners can develop and implement communication strategies for collaboration with diverse stakeholders

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
